alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 28 at 3:00AM PST until December 31 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches, with localized amounts 12 inches or more are possible. Areas of southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with local gusts to 55 mph in the San Bernardino Mountains. * WHERE...Above 5,000 feet in the San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From late tonight through late Thursday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Significant reductions in visibility are possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains
